itunes:title: Travis Barker Can Say (Part 2 with Lex Niko!)
title: Travis Barker Can Say (Part 2 with Lex Niko!)
description: Pop culture scholar Lex Niko joins us to further gush on the sweetie pie (with maybe one or two flaws??) that is Travis Barker based on his memoir, Can I Say. Later in the episode, we go beyond the text and discuss his life all the way up until today and his saucy, thumb suckin relationship with Kourtney Kardashian. Follow Lex on Tik Tok, Instagram, and Twitter @lexniko Check out her podcast One Last Thing!https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/one-last-thing/id1195468630Follow us on Twitter @cmbc_podcast and Instagram @celebritymemoirbookclub If you want even more juice subscribe to our patreon!!! This week we’re watching Meet The Barkers!https://www.patreon.com/celebritymemoirbookclub Art by @adrianne_manpearl and theme song by @ashleesimpsonrossSupport the show
